description: If you love the flavours of Turkish pide but are short on time, try this cheat's version with naan breads.
name: Cheat's Pide Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 small red onion, peeled and finely sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large pan on medium heat and cook the lamb for 8-9 minutes until nicely browned. Stir in garlic, tomato puree and the spices and cook for 2 minutes.
Brush naan breads with oil and place under a hot grill for 2 minutes. Spread each evenly with the lamb mix and sprinkle with feta.
Grill the pides for 2-3 minutes. Serve topped with finely sliced red onion and fresh coriander.
